Waking up after centuries of oblivion, an effort to lose their immortality shackles, 
Dracula must return their forces and strike deals with death, To kill Satan and 
receive eternal rest.
An epic adventure fantasy, passing in the vast world today. First in a series of 
Castlevania Dracula play for and discover the final fate of the Lord of Shadows.
